modName: Hitomi Follower (POSSIBLY BROKEN) (originally by Jackga and another unknown modder)

descriptionHtml:
Originally on the skyrim workshop, removed for an unknown reason. Check Jackga's steam group to see it it appears again!

THIS IS A WORK IN PROGRESS. 

ALL CREDIT FOR CONSTRUCTION OF THE MOD GOES TO JACK. I'M MERELY THE JANITOR.
